name: glassily
content:
glassily adverb
(EYES)
Add to word list
Add to word list
with eyes that have a fixed expression and seem unable to see anything: He lifted his head and stared glassily at them. They did not speak, but stared glassily ahead.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was sitting on the floor, staring glassily at the pile of junk.He failed to answer reporters' questions, smiling glassily before moving off with his aides.

glassily adverb
(SURFACE)
with a surface that is smooth and shiny, like glass: The sea was glassily calm. I had been polishing my shoes for so long that they were now glistening glassily.
